WWWOFFLE - World Wide Web Offline Explorer

WWWOFFLE - Unsupported Method

The request to the WWWOFFLE server used the
$method
method $protocol?=all{ which is not supported for any protocols. } { with the
$protocol
protocol which is not a supported combination. }

Help

The WWWOFFLE program can only process requests for the protocols and HTTP methods that it understands. WWWOFFLE handles the most common protocols for fetching data like the HTTP and FTP protocols and the common methods like GET and POST.
